nodes.text: "A Recipe for Death" is a short story by Landry Q. Walker that was published inside the anthology Tales from a Galaxy Far, Far Away: Aliens: Volume I on April 5, 2016. The story recounts the disappearance of a sous chef working at Takodana Castle.
When his sous chef turns up dead, the cook at Takodana Castle holds an unusual competition to find the culprit in "A Recipe for Death."
